body_html: Yes, the ordering of weights a biases is the same for all implementations and is ingate, forgetgate, cellgate, outgate. You need to initialize the values between 1/4 and 1/2 of the bias vector to the desired value.
body_text: Yes, the ordering of weights a biases is the same for all implementations and is ingate, forgetgate, cellgate, outgate. You need to initialize the values between 1/4 and 1/2 of the bias vector to the desired value.
body: Yes, the ordering of weights a biases is the same for all implementations and is `ingate, forgetgate, cellgate, outgate`. You need to initialize the values between 1/4 and 1/2 of the bias vector to the desired value.
